data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Header'
define view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVH
  as select from zetr_t_r102                 as InvoiceHeader
    inner join   ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_INV_HEAD_RPR as InvoiceHeaderReport on InvoiceHeaderReport.BillingDocument = InvoiceHeader.vbeln
  association to parent ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD as _ExportFile on $projection.FileExportNumber = _ExportFile.Filen

{
  key InvoiceHeader.filen as FileExportNumber,
  key InvoiceHeader.vbeln as BillingDocument,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CompanyCode,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CompanyCodeName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.BillingDocumentType,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.BillingDocumentTypeName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.SalesOrganization,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.SalesOrganizationName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.DistributionChannel,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.DistributionChannelName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.Division,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.DivisionName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.PayerParty,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.PayerPartyName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.SoldToParty,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.SoldToPartyName,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      InvoiceHeaderReport.TotalNetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      InvoiceHeaderReport.TotalTaxAmount,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.TransactionCurrency,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.BillingDocumentDate,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.DocumentReferenceID,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CustomerPaymentTerms,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CustomerPaymentTermsName,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.IncotermsClassification,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.IncotermsVersion,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CreationDate,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CreationTime,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.CreatedByUser,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.AccountingTransferStatus,
      InvoiceHeaderReport.AccountingTransferStatusText,
      _ExportFile
}
